close() - Method in class com.tk.wightwhale.graphics.GraphicsController

Contains all objects displayed on screen

Contains graphics / rendering elements

Contains level-related classes

Contains utility classes

This initializes the GameSegment data structure It clears the map when called
ControlScheme - Class in com.tk.wightwhale.utils
Encapsulates common player-controlled keys and responses by a moving object
